ARABIC: قُلْ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'Mankind, I am only a clear warner to you.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Tell them: "O men, it's my duty to warn you clearly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say (O Muhammad): "O people! I have been sent to you only as a plain warner (before the Doom strikes you)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell them, "People, I am giving you a clear warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “O mankind, I am for you only a clear Herald of Warning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "O mankind! I am (sent) to you only as a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: O people! I am only a plain warner to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'O men, I am only for you a plain warner.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: O mankind! I am only a plain warner unto you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "O people, I am sent only to give you clear warning."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: mankind! I am unto you only a warner manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘O mankind! I am only a manifest warner to you!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "O men! I am (sent) to you only to give a Clear Warning:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "O mankind! I am (sent) to you only as a plain warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say (Prophet Muhammad): 'O people, I have been sent to warn you plainly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “O people, I am only a plain warner to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [22:49] Say: ‘O mankind, that is, [O] people of Mecca, I am only a manifest warner to you’, one whose warning is plain; but also I am a giver of good tidings to the believers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say: mankind!) people of Mecca! (I am) from Allah (only a plain) addressing you in a language you know (warner unto you) a warning Messenger. 369
